title: Mac osx sierra
body:
So, the item sets that I can't edit because I have Mac OSX Sierra, may I ask if there will soon be a solution to this? It is rather annoying to deal with at the moment as I can't do anything.
Thanks!
- (item sets are awesome)

replies.body: We have a [pinned thread ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bJx6P0hX-known-bugs-in-macos-1012-sierra)currently on some known issues with the Sierra update, which includes item sets.  I don't have any eta's to provide, but a current work around may be to save items on another device.  It will save server side and used on your Sierra OS from there.  Hope that helps!
Thank you much! I will use my spare (although garbage) windows laptop.
